# init(mapFeatureAnnotation:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new map item request with the specified feature annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
init(mapFeatureAnnotation: MKMapFeatureAnnotation)
```

## Parameters

- **mapFeatureAnnotation**: The [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapFeatureAnnotation] to use to initialize the map item request.

## Creating a request

- **init(feature:)**: Creates a new map item request with the specified map feature.
- **init(mapItemIdentifier:)**: Create a request with a map item identifier.
